{"id":747405684,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5 months, 1 week","timestamp":1657852291,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"36 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/747405684/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"23.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    int dx4[4] = {0, 0, 1, -1};\n    int dy4[4] = {1, -1, 0, 0};\n    int n, m;\n    \n    bool isOK(int u, int v){\n        if(u>=0 && v>=0 && u<n && v<m) return true;\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    int dfs(vector< vector<int> > &grid, int u, int v){\n        grid[u][v] = 2;\n        int ret = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<4; i++){\n            int x = u + dx4[i];\n            int y = v + dy4[i];\n            if(isOK(x, y) && grid[x][y]==1){\n                ret = ret + dfs(grid, x, y) + 1;\n            }\n        }\n            \n        return ret;\n    }\n    \n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        n = grid.size();\n        m = grid[0].size();\n        \n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++){\n            for(int j=0; j<m; j++){\n                if(grid[i][j]==1){\n                    ans = max(ans, dfs(grid, i, j)+1);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
